data.title: #1 Person in History Who Died This Day
data.meta_description: Discover the most important person in history who died on April 26 & famous people who share this death date like Lucille Ball and George Jones.
data.text:
Famous April 26 Deaths

The Most Historically Significant Person Who Died on this Day is Count Basie.

Fame Meter (31/100) Considered well known in the World

Birth date

Sunday, August 21, 1904

Death date

Thursday, April 26, 1984

Count Basie is the most famous person born on April 26. They were born on a Sunday. They died on a Thursday. They were 79 years, 8 months and 5 days old when they died. Their most notable profession was Musician. Their other professions include bandleader and composer. Their Zodiac sign is ♌ Leo. Their Chinese Zodiac sign is 龍 Dragon. They are considered the most important person in history who died on the 26th day in the month of April.

The location of their death was Hollywood, Florida.

Next most famous people who died on April 26

Top 96%Weak

Not many famous people died on this day versus people who died on other days.

Fame Power of People:

Top 94%Weak

The people who died on this day are less famous than people who died on other days.

Fame Ranking

What does "Most Famous" mean? Unlike other sites which use current mentions, follower counts, etc. that tend to call the most famous people YouTube stars or Reality TV stars, we've decided to mark fame as a persons importance in history. We've conducted research scouring millions of historical references to determine the importance of people in History. That being said, we might have missed a few people here and there. The ranking system is a continuing work in progress - if you happen to feel like someone is misranked or missing, please shoot us a message!
